text: The Law of the North is a 1917 American silent adventure movie directed by Edward H. Griffith and Burton George. It stars Shirley Mason, Pat O'Malley, Richard Tucker, Charles Sutton, Sally Crute. ==Other websites== * Category:1917 movies Category:1910s adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by Edward H. Griffith
title: The Law of the North (1917 movie)
